TopicTitle: Probe core Kerbnet access tied to Assembly anchor instead of Probe core

Articles.Content: When a Probe core controlled craft has another part, for example a tank of the 1st tage booster as the Assembly anchor it looses connection to Kerbnet (all controll) when that part gets seperated.

Can confirm; a 7 part probe with anchor in the first stage consistently loses control on stage separation. Camera follows probe core, but further stages report "No CommNet connection".

Saving and loading restored control.
